Package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.examples.nes

The nes package contains an example of using the framework as a nes controller substitute.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccelerationPhaseDetection.AccelerationListener
    This interface must be implemented if you want to be notified of the detected movements
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccelerationPhaseDetection
    This class may be used to detect forth-and-back movements in the z-axis of linear acceleration of a device.
    ButtonConfig
    POJO for mapping psychic button ids to java robot keycodes
    NesServer
    This server is designed to create NES controller input from gravity and linear acceleration data
    SteeringWheel
    Created by Ulrich on 12.12.2016 This class is responsible for steering the player in simple NES racing games
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PsychicNesButton
    Psychic button ids
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidButtonException
    An exception for catching buttons in the button property file that could not be mapped to javas VK_<key> codes.

Package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.examples.nes Description

The nes package contains an example of using the framework as a nes controller substitute.
